title: MEDITERRANEAN SALAD
ingredients: Broccoli, Spinach, Red Pepper, Carrots, onions, Quinoa
instruction: Cook the quinoa in water. While the quinoa is cooking, cook the vegetables. When everything has cooled, mix together.

title: PUMPKIN SOUP
ingredients: Butter, Onions, Garlic, Pumpkin, Havy Cream, Salt and Pepper
instruction: Melt the butter over medium heat, add the garlic to the onions and stir constantly for 1 minute. Turn heat to low and add pumpkin puree and simmer the soup for 2 mins. Stir the heavy cream into the soup, serve immediately.

title: SPAGHETTI OLIO
ingredients: 1 pound of whole whaet angel pasta, 1/2 pound mushroom, 1 small onion, diced 3-4 cloves garlic, 2 tablespoons butter, Fresh parsley, red onion, grated parmesan, sea salt and black pepper.
instruction: Cook pasta. Drain and set aside. Fry butter, add onions, mushroom and flour. Chop bacon to slices, add to pan and mix for five minutes. Simmer for 5 minutes. Serve.

title: CLASSIC GRILLED CHEESE SANDWICH
ingredients: 4 slices of bread, 4 slices of cheddar cheese, 2 tbsp butter.
instruction: Lay out the bread slices. Place two slices of cheese between two slices of bread to make each sandwich. Spread butter on each. Heat. Cook for about 3-4 minutes until golden brown. Allow to cook for a minute, then cut diagonally. Serve.

title: CHICKEN CORDON BLEU
ingredients: Skinless chicken breasts, Swiss cheese, Ham, Flour, Slt and pepper, Eggs, Butter, Breadcrumbs, Chicken broth, Cornstarch, Heavy cream.
instruction: Prepare the chicken, bread the chicken, cook the chicken, make the sauce, serve.

title: CORDON BLEU
ingredients: Skinless chicken breasts, Swiss cheese, Ham, Flour, Slt and pepper, Eggs, Butter, Breadcrumbs, Chicken broth, Cornstarch, Heavy cream.
instruction: Prepare the chicken, bread the chicken, cook the chicken, make the sauce, serve.
